name: macos-calendar
description: Add or list calendar events using AppleScript
author: Example

command.description: Action to perform: 'addEvent' creates calendar event, 'listToday' shows all events for current day

title.description: Display name for calendar event. Required for addEvent command

start_date.description: Start time in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss' format (e.g., '2024-01-31 09:00:00'). Required for addEvent

end_date.description: End time in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss' format (e.g., '2024-01-31 10:00:00'). Required for addEvent

calendar_name.description: Target calendar name. Must exist in macOS Calendar app. Default: 'Calendar'

result.description: Operation result details, includes error message if command failed
